Articles.Content: Finally I have gotten a forum account. In KSP I like big. I like recreating things in ksp especially trains. I got kip when 0.23 was just released. So yay I'm on the forums.
Welcome aboard conductor. Wait until 1.1 starts getting close. Your train skills will be needed.

Hello Spacetraindriver, and welcome to the forums!

We have a number of train enthusiasts around here.

Happy landings!
Welcome! You might want to see Union_pacific, too.
